metadata.title: Club Roles & Responsibilities
metadata.description: Learn about the various leadership roles and committee positions in our Toastmasters club. Discover how each role contributes to member growth and club success.

introduction.title: Club Roles & Responsibilities
introduction.subtitle: Learn about the leadership opportunities and meeting roles that make our club successful
introduction.description: Every role in Toastmasters provides valuable leadership experience and skill development. Whether serving on the executive committee or taking a meeting role, you'll build confidence, practice new skills, and contribute to the success of our club.

executive_committee.title: President
executive_committee.description: Chief executive officer of the club, responsible for overall club success.

executive_committee.title: Vice President Education (VPE)
executive_committee.description: Oversees all educational programs and member progress.

executive_committee.title: Vice President Membership (VPM)
executive_committee.description: Responsible for attracting and retaining members.

executive_committee.title: Vice President Public Relations (VPPR)
executive_committee.description: Manages the club's public image and promotes the club.

executive_committee.title: Secretary
executive_committee.description: Maintains club records and manages correspondence.

executive_committee.title: Treasurer
executive_committee.description: Manages club finances and collects dues.

executive_committee.title: Sergeant at Arms (SAA)
executive_committee.description: Ensures the meeting space is properly set up and manages club resources.

meeting_roles.title: Toastmaster of the Day
meeting_roles.description: Hosts and facilitates the club meeting.

meeting_roles.title: General Evaluator
meeting_roles.description: Oversees the evaluation portion of the meeting.

meeting_roles.title: Speech Evaluator
meeting_roles.description: Provides constructive feedback on prepared speeches.

meeting_roles.title: Timer
meeting_roles.description: Tracks and signals time for all speakers.

meeting_roles.title: Grammarian
meeting_roles.description: Tracks language use and introduces Word of the Day.

meeting_roles.title: Ah-Counter
meeting_roles.description: Tracks verbal pauses and filler words.

support_roles.title: Mentor
support_roles.description: Guides new members through their first months in Toastmasters.

support_roles.title: Webmaster
support_roles.description: Maintains and updates the club website and online presence.

benefits.title: Build Leadership Skills
benefits.description: Every role develops specific leadership competencies that transfer to your professional and personal life.

benefits.title: Practice in Safety
benefits.description: Make mistakes and learn in a supportive environment where everyone is focused on growth.

benefits.title: Connect with Members
benefits.description: Taking roles helps you build relationships and become an integral part of the club community.

benefits.title: Accelerate Your Progress
benefits.description: Many roles count toward Pathways leadership projects and help you complete levels faster.

cta.title: Ready to Take on a Role?
cta.description: Talk to our Vice President Education about volunteering for a role at your next meeting. Every journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step!
